item.title: Mental Well-being Workshop
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description:
The RPA is happy to announce a workshop on Mental Well-being in Academia on November 9 at 2 p.m. (Student Success Center, Group meeting room 1), led by Dr. Evelyn VÃ¡zquez, an expert on higher education, mental health, and emancipatory approaches.

The workshop will address topics such as issues in the academic environment, the prevalence of mental health conditions, and protective factors.

Please register to attend this highly relevant workshop here .
